message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CL. 

The paper presents improvements to the soft attention model for action recognition in videos, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a hierarchical system architecture, which involves reasoning on multi-granularities of action categories, indicating a possible connection to machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG and cs.AI). The model is applied to recognize actions in videos, which falls under multimedia (cs.MM) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories.
